short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize the entire year with progress tracking and daily notes on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never lose sight of how much time you really have in a year, and your most important goals. Every time you open a new tab, you're able to see the entire year ahead!
